textfields.tf: The ECAS ECU detects a minor fault.
The ECAS ECU detects a severe fault.
The trailer superstructure is on driving level.
The trailer superstructure is outside the driving level.
What does it mean, when after switching the ignition on the ECAS signal lamp shows steady light?
That´s wrong. Minor as well as severe faults are indicated by flashing.
No, that would be disadvantageous, because the ECAS signal lamp would be always switched on during driving.
On the trailer the steady light of the ECAS signal lamp means, that the superstructure is not on driving level.
Right, on the trailer the steady light of the ECAS signal lamp means, that the superstructure is not on driving level.
